lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : Golden Landis Von Jones/Omer Fedi/Keegan Bach/Michael Olmo
[00:00.683] 作曲 : Golden Landis Von Jones/Omer Fedi/Keegan Bach/Michael Olmo
[00:01.366]Producers：KBeaZy/Omer Fedi
[00:09.834]Why you always in a mood?
[00:11.608]****in 'round, actin' brand new
[00:13.418]I ain't tryna tell you what to do
[00:15.305]But try to play it cool
[00:16.560]Baby, I ain't playing by your rules
[00:18.682]Everything look better with a view
[00:20.493]Why you always in a mood?
[00:21.888]F**kin 'round, actin' brand new
[00:23.768]I ain't tryna tell you what to do
[00:25.752]But try to play it cool
[00:27.115]Baby, I ain't playing by your rules
[00:29.158]Everything look better with a view
[00:30.952]I could never get attached
[00:32.465]When I start to feel I unattach
[00:34.333]Somehow always end up feeling bad
[00:36.281]Baby I am not your dad
[00:37.635]It's not all you want from me?
[00:39.353]I just want your company
[00:41.285]Girl it's obvious
[00:43.043]Elephant in the room
[00:44.394]And we're a part of it
[00:45.923]Don't act so confused
[00:47.064]And you love startin' it
[00:48.149]Now I'm in a mood
[00:49.797]And we arguin' in my bedroom
[00:52.720]We play games of love to avoid the depression
[00:57.877]We've been here before
[00:59.712]And I won't be your victim
[01:02.493]Why you always in a mood?
[01:04.194]F**kin 'round, actin' brand new
[01:06.155]I ain't tryna tell you what to do
[01:07.799]But try to play it cool
[01:09.313]Baby, I ain't playing by your rules
[01:11.376]Everything look better with a view
[01:13.094]Why you always in a mood?
[01:14.790]F**kin 'round, actin' brand new
[01:16.522]I ain't tryna tell you what to do
[01:18.260]But try to play it cool
[01:19.668]Baby, I ain't playing by your rules
[01:21.694]Everything look better with a view
[01:23.614]So why you tryin' to fake your love on the regular
[01:26.622]When you could be blowin' up just like my cellular
[01:29.426]I won't ever let a shorty go and set me up
[01:31.863]Only thing I need to know is if you wet enough
[01:34.788]I'm talking slik back, kick back, gang sippin' fourties
[01:37.940]You keep playin, not another day with you shorty
[01:40.319]Mismatched fits that was way before you know me
[01:42.994]Got a lot of love, well you better save it for me
[01:45.635]We play games of love to avoid the depression
[01:50.390]We been here before
[01:51.932]And I won't be your victim
[01:55.257]Why you always in a mood?
[01:56.812]F**kin 'round, actin' brand new
[01:58.825]I ain't tryna tell you what to do
[02:00.501]But try to play it cool
[02:02.129]Baby, I ain't playing by your rules
[02:04.102]Everything look better with a view
[02:05.828]Why you always in a mood?
[02:07.311]F**kin 'round, actin' brand new
[02:09.403]I ain't tryna tell you what to do
[02:11.149]But try to play it cool
[02:12.639]Baby, I ain't playing by your rules
[02:14.691]Everything look better with a view
tlyric:
[00:01.366]
[00:01.989]
[00:09.834]你怎么总不开心？
[00:11.608]到处晃 总改变性情
[00:13.418]我不想指点你该怎么做
[00:15.305]只是想冷静地说
[00:16.560]宝贝 不会按你规则来
[00:18.682]视野开阔 一切更精彩
